item.description:
Session Americana sit tightly around a small cafe table, ambient mics tuned to catch the whole sound of the voices and instruments. A suit-case drum kit, an old electric bass, a bunch of acoustic instruments, a field organ: This format feels very theatrical and though the musicians face each other, the audience feels drawn into the circle by the warmth, joy and camaraderie that emanate outwards by the all star cast of characters seated around the table.

From Session Americana:

There will be a normal Session set from 9:30-10:30 and an all-Irish set at 11:00 featuring John Powhida, Andrea Gillis, Bill Janovitz, Rachael Price and others.

Tickets are available at www.brownpapertickets.com/event/58985
There will also be first-come-first-serve tickets at the door.

We anticipate some interest in this show, so buy tix in advance, if you plan to come.
Tix are $6.12 ($5.00 + 1.12) in advance, $8.00 at the show.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell# to attendees.
item.name: Irish Session Americana @ Lizard Lounge
